channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- JNews
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- JNews

item.title: CVE-2021-24342|2024-08-03T19:28:23.516Z -- unknown -- jnews
item.description: The JNews WordPress theme before 8.0.6 did not sanitise the cat_id parameter in the POST request /?ajax-request=jnews (with action=jnews_build_mega_category_*), leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) issue.
